attributes.title: Adam Leadbetter
attributes.imdb: http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0494895/'''Adam Leadbetter''' is an actor. He is known for his roles in the television series ''Lost'', ''Alias'', ''Charmed'', ''True Blood'', ''The Mentalist'' and ''Hawaii Five-O'' and his voice roles in the video games ''Kingdom Hearts II'' and several titles based on ''The Lord of The Rings'', ''Dragon Age'' and ''Star Wars''.In ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series'', he voices Croft.==Credits==Telltale Game Series Credits
